abstract: DealBook Online; online gambling company 888 Holdings makes bid for Bwin.Party Digital Entertainment.
lead_paragraph: The offer by the Gibraltar-based 888, which specializes in casino games, poker and sports betting, follows a takeover move by GVC Holdings.

headline.main: Online Gambling Company 888 Holdings Bids for Bwin.Party

snippet: The offer by the Gibraltar-based 888, which specializes in casino games, poker and sports betting, follows a takeover move by GVC Holdings.
